creator: gabe@groundzero.com
text:
The error tag is listed in the tld as <name>Error</name>
but in the example mailer.jsp it is used as <mt:error> This causes a 
JasperException that the tag is not found (It is looking for "error" but the 
tag is actually "Error").

All that needs to be done to fix this is to change the name of the tag Error to 
error in mailer.tld.
